name: Culinary Health
slogan: Clean Vegan Luxury Catering (Gluten free, raw, keto, paleo)
description: We are targeting an affluent health conscious clientele in central London as well as companies in the fashion industry.

jobs.title: Freelance Catering Assistant / Sous Chef
jobs.description:
We are looking for a driven individual with proven experience in the catering industry. You should be familiar with logistics for events.
Sales and experience as a Sous Chef would be highly desired. 
This is a freelance position to assist as required but can turn into a full time employment with potential equity share / revenue share.

Main Responsibilities/Duties Include:
- Hands on support at events
- Support in food preparation
- Catering set up, drop off and clean down
- Following the general standards, ENGIE policies and Food Safety Hygiene
- Be diligent, polite and honest in all aspect 
- Work well as a team and own initiative depending on schedule and tasks accordingly

Qualifications Or Required Experience:
- Reliable, flexible and adaptable
- Catering experience is essential
- Elementary Food Hygiene Certificate
- HACCP Knowledge
- Quality System Knowledge
- Health & safety knowledge
- Customer Service skills, being customer focused at all times
- Well presented
- Energy, confidence and enthusiasm
- Ability to work under pressure
- Able to communicate in a calm and professional style
- Great organisational skills
- A strong passion for food. A real foodie with a good understanding of British produce and its seasonality as well as the availability of products through artisan suppliers.
